column6: 2015 in the lebanon va medical center hospice. born june 13
column8: he was a son of the late wayland and louise (campbell) alexander and was also preceded in death by his wife sonia a. alexander and brother john. he attended milton hershey school class of 1963
column9: retired from the railroad and served in the u. s. army in germany during the vietnam era. surviving are four brothers ron
column12: and glenn; two sisters carol and mary; step-children shane
column16: and katie; numerous step-grandchildren; nieces and nephews. interment
